Text:
Ive made a mistake with the audio though forgot to convert to mp3 to make it more standard... not that it worried watching on laptop in VLC 1.11

but if you grab the free tool called avidemux and load it into that
and change copy to mp3 lame under audio on the side and then go file pulldown and save avi it takes about 3 minutes to convert it to standard xvidmp3 format :)

I might re-add the fix to season finale next week though.. see how bandwidth goes.

S03E13 - E14 still not been released by ten

funny that.. being a double episode and season final :(
